Direct Translation: Sol sol, G, G, A, B, C.
Poetic Translation: Sol sol gee gee A B C,
With love in my heart I'm coming

Lyrics: De la, sol, fa, mi, re, ut.
Direct Translation: With la, sol, fa, mi, re, ut.
Poetic Translation: With la sol fa mi re ut.

Lyrics: Iba a ver a mi madre
Direct Translation: I was going to see my mother,
And what I sang I will tell you:
Sol sol, G, G, A, B, C.
Poetic Translation: Sol sol gee gee A B C,
With love in my heart I'm coming

Lyrics: De la, sol, fa, mi, re, ut.
